courses.description: Learn A-Z everything about Python, from the basics, to advanced topics like Python GUI, Python Data Analysis, and more!
what you will learn: Have an intermediate skill level of Python programming.
Use the numpy library to create and manipulate arrays.
Use the pandas module with Python to create and structure data.
Learn how to work with various data formats within python, including: JSON,HTML, and MS Excel Worksheets.
Create data visualizations using matplotlib and the seaborn modules with python.
Have a portfolio of various data analysis projects.
